channel.title: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?
channel.description:
So as of now, when I range or mage a monster, it does not chase me. How do I make it chase? \
Also, is there a way to make npcs range or mage players?

item.title: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:11, topic:416627”]What I always wanted to do but never figured out was how to make the NPC follow the player without eventually attacking. If I could, then we would be able to run around with pet NPCs following us like cats do in RS2 and all the assorted minions in WoW do. If anyone does find a way and goes ahead and shares the code, I would be thrilled.[/quote]You can ‘copy’ the follow method used by players.

Though, it uses events, and you’ll have to make event constructors take mobs instead of players.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?

item.title: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

What I always wanted to do but never figured out was how to make the NPC follow the player without eventually attacking. If I could, then we would be able to run around with pet NPCs following us like cats do in RS2 and all the assorted minions in WoW do. If anyone does find a way and goes ahead and shares the code, I would be thrilled.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?

item.title: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

When the player ranges or mages the NPC make then NPC attack the player…

Look in the Npc class.

[/quote]dark wizards[/quote]Uh? tought dark wizards only do mele but i think zamorak monks can weak your stats (not sure if casting or just by contact).

item.title: How do you make npcs chase you when ranging/maging?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

RSCA and DarkQuest made NPCs chase but they are not able to mage. No RSC NPC has ever been able to mage players. That began in RS2. It could be programmed, however.

Read full topic
